meanings.definition: The quality of being clearly defined or certain.
meanings.sent1: The determinateness of the rules made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: The determinateness of the schedule helped everyone plan their day.
meanings.sent3: The determinateness of the recipe made it impossible to mess up.
meanings.sent4: His determinateness in decision-making was like a compass guiding us.
meanings.sent5: The determinateness of the answer left no room for doubt.

meanings.definition: The state of having a fixed or specific limit or boundary.
meanings.sent1: The determinateness of the property line prevented any disputes.
meanings.sent2: The determinateness of the deadline kept everyone on track.
meanings.sent3: The determinateness of the game's boundaries led to some funny moments.
meanings.sent4: Her determinateness in setting boundaries was like a fortress protecting her.
meanings.sent5: The determinateness of the wall made it impossible to pass through.
